title: Sex Tape Notification
itunes:title: Sex Tape Notification
description:
Today on the show we had Cheryl McKissack & Don Peebles stop by and spoke about the 'Affirmation Tower', Minority Developers, Equality and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Florida man who went on a racist rant and threatened to lynch a popeyes employee. Next, they opened the phone lines for Freaky Friday to see if our listeners ever sent a nude or sextape to the wrong person?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
